00066     class _OgrePagingExport SimplePageContentCollection : public PageContentCollection
00067     {
00068     public:
00069         typedef vector<PageContent*>::type ContentList;
00070         static const uint32 SUBCLASS_CHUNK_ID;
00071         static const uint16 SUBCLASS_CHUNK_VERSION;
00072     protected:
00073         ContentList mContentList;
00074     public:
00075         SimplePageContentCollection(PageContentCollectionFactory* creator);
00076         ~SimplePageContentCollection();
00077 
00081         virtual PageContent* createContent(const String& typeName);
00082 
00087         virtual void destroyContent(PageContent* coll);
00088 
00090         virtual const ContentList& getContentList() const { return mContentList; }
00091 
00092         // Overridden from PageContentCollection
00093         virtual void save(StreamSerialiser& stream);
00094         virtual void frameStart(Real timeSinceLastFrame);
00095         virtual void frameEnd(Real timeElapsed);
00096         virtual void notifyCamera(Camera* cam);
00097         bool prepare(StreamSerialiser& stream);
00098         void load();
00099         void unload();
00100         void unprepare();
00101

00103 
00104 
00105 
00106 
00107     };

00111     class _OgrePagingExport SimplePageContentCollectionFactory : public PageContentCollectionFactory
00112     {
00113     public:
00114         static String FACTORY_NAME;
00115 
00116         SimplePageContentCollectionFactory() {}
00117         ~SimplePageContentCollectionFactory() {}
00118 
00119         const String& getName() const { return FACTORY_NAME; }
00120 
00121         PageContentCollection* createInstance() 
00122         {
00123             return OGRE_NEW SimplePageContentCollection(this); 
00124         }
00125         void destroyInstance(PageContentCollection* c)
00126         {
00127             OGRE_DELETE c;
00128         }
